TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ParentControlDesigner extends System.Windows.Forms.Design.ControlDesigner

summary.span: 擴充支援巢狀控制項之 的設計模式行為。

span.span: Extends the design mode behavior of a that supports nested controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供基底類別的控制項可以包含子控制項的設計工具。 provides a base class for designers of controls that can contain child controls. 除了方法和繼承自功能和類別，允許子控制項以加入、 移除、 內，選取和排列控制項在設計延伸至其行為中時間。In addition to the methods and functionality inherited from the and classes, enables child controls to be added to, removed from, selected within, and arranged within the control whose behavior it extends at design time. 您可將設計工具關聯型別使用。You can associate a designer with a type using a . 如需自訂設計階段行為的概觀，請參閱[擴充設計階段支援](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d6ac8a6a-42fd-4bc8-bf33-b212811297e2)。For an overview of customizing design time behavior, see [Extending Design-Time Support](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d6ac8a6a-42fd-4bc8-bf33-b212811297e2). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何實作自訂。The following example demonstrates how to implement a custom . 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分介面。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the interface. [!code-cpp[IToolboxUserExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IToolboxUserExample/CPP/samplecontrol.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IToolboxUserExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IToolboxUserExample/CS/samplecontrol.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IToolboxUserExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IToolboxUserExample/VB/samplecontrol.vb#1)]

span.span: Creates a component or control from the specified tool and adds it to the current design document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 新元件或控制項位於目前所選控制項的中央。The new component or control is positioned at the center of the currently selected control. 這個方法會使用預設大小的工具，如果此工具有指定的預設大小。This method uses the default size for the tool, if the tool has a default size specified. 若要指定位置或位置，元件或控制項的大小，請使用其中一個其他多載方法。To specify a location or location and size for the component or control, use one of the other overloaded methods.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 新元件或控制項位於所指定的位置周圍`location`參數。The new component or control is positioned around the location specified by the `location` parameter. 如果元件有預設的大小，此方法會使用預設大小的工具元件。This method uses the default size for the tool's component, if the component has a default size. 若要指定位置，元件或控制項的大小，請使用適當的多載方法。To specify a location and size for the component or control, use the appropriate overloaded method.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void Dispose (bool disposing);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
protected: override void Dispose(bool disposing);

param.name: disposing
param.span: 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源， 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性釋放 Managed 資源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the , and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose()`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設定為`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 叫用`Dispose`與`disposing`設`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 當`disposing`參數為 true，這個方法的任何 managed 物件所持有的資源全部釋出這個參考。When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 在覆寫小心不要參考物件已處置過的早期呼叫中。

span.span: When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 如需有關如何實作，請參閱[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 如需有關和，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[覆寫 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

summary.span: 呼叫以回應在元件上按住滑鼠左鍵。

span.span: Called in response to the left mouse button being pressed and held while over the component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 以回應在元件上按下滑鼠左的按鈕會呼叫這個方法。This method is called in response to the left mouse button being pressed on a component. 在設計工具會覆寫這個方法提供 「 套索 」 選取範圍機制，控制項中的元件的基底表單。The designer overrides the base form of this method to provide a "lasso" selection mechanism for components within the control. > [!NOTE] > 您可以將點傳遞至螢幕座標中方法類別來取得控制項相對於左上角之點的座標。You can pass a point in screen coordinates to the method of the class to obtain the coordinates of the point relative to the upper-left corner of the control.

summary.span: 提供變更目前滑鼠游標的機會。

span.span: Provides an opportunity to change the current mouse cursor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會設定將滑鼠游標，根據下列規則： 如果工具箱服務選取工具，它可讓工具箱服務來設定資料指標。This method sets the mouse cursor according to the following rules: If the toolbox service has a tool selected, it allows the toolbox service to set the cursor. 否則，將滑鼠游標會設為預設的滑鼠游標。Otherwise, the mouse cursor is set to the default mouse cursor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這介面方法的覆寫會將一組屬性新增至這個設計工具控制項可讓使用者設定選項相關以方格顯示和子控制項對齊效果。This interface method override adds a set of properties to this designer's control that allow a user to set options related to the grid display and child control alignment. 這個方法會加入下列可瀏覽屬性： `DrawGrid`， `SnapToGrid`，和`GridSize`。This method adds the following browsable properties: `DrawGrid`, `SnapToGrid`, and `GridSize`.
